extracted_data.title: SAP HCM Consultant / Developer (m/f/d)
extracted_data.description:
For our client we are looking for a freelance SAP HCM Consultant / Developer (m/f/d),

Start: asap

Duration: 31.12.25 (option to extend)

Location: Remote, possibly individual stays with the customer in the Mainz area


Support, optimization and further development of the SAP HCM system landscape. The focus here is on close cooperation with the HR Management department in order to digitize and automate processes.

Support and customizing: Ensuring the smooth operation and adaptation of the SAP HCM modules, in particular Payroll (PY), Time Management (PT), Personnel Administration (PA) and Organizational Management (OM).

Development: Conception and implementation of in-house developments using ABAP and ABAP OO as well as the design of interfaces with SAP Fiori/UI5.

Process optimization: Analysis of existing personnel processes, identification of potentials and implementation of optimizations in SAP.

Support & training: Providing 2nd and 3rd level support and carrying out user training.

Project work: Active participation in IT projects in the HR environment, from conception to go-live.


  • Extensive practical experience in the SAP HCM environment (esp. PY, PT, PA, OM).
  • Sound knowledge of ABAP and ABAP OO development.
  • Ideally experience in development with SAP Fiori/UI5.
  • Expertise in the analysis and optimization of HR processes.
  • An independent, solution-oriented and communicative way of working.

extracted_data.title: C Developer Life Insurance (m/f/d) (Insurance, remote/Hamburg)
extracted_data.description:
Tasks: 
- Development and maintenance of components in the life computing core based mainly on C and partly PL/I
- Technical implementation of functional requirements in close cooperation with business analysts and the product owner
- Development of interfaces to peripheral systems in accordance with applicable architectural specifications
- Ensuring the quality and structured documentation of the developed solutions
- Support with technical tests and the implementation of direct data extracts

Requirements:
- Sound knowledge of C and the host environment (e.g. TSO, JCL) (+++).
- Experience with interface architectures (+++)
- Basic knowledge of databases (e.g. SQL, DB2) (+++)
- Basic know-how in operational activities (e.g. Automic, SFTP) (+)
- Basic knowledge of PL/I is an advantage (++)
- Understanding of the technical processes in the life area (application, contract, service). (+)
- Analytical thinking, structured way of working and good communication skills. (++)
- Skills in business analysis would be an advantage, as well as actuarial understanding. (++)
- First experience with agile methods and tools (e.g. JIRA, Confluence). (+)
- Good written and spoken German language skills are required. (++)
- First experience in agile working methods is an advantage. (+)

Start: asap
End: 31.12.2026
Utilization: 50% with 2.5 PT per week 
Location: Remote, training (partly) on site in Hamburg
